title: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI
description: Bug 17825: ControlExampleText beeps when I choose SWT.MULTI. Somehow, I don't think it's supposed to do that.
OB: When choosing SWT.MULTI, clicking on other buttons also makes the bell sound.
EB: I hear a Windows 'ding' when I choose SWT.MULTI (the bell sound that indicates an incorrect action).
SR: Ensure that selecting SWT.MULTI does not trigger the bell sound, and investigate the cause of unintended beeping on button clicks.
